divs: Sighting Detailson one night so long ago, though it seems like only yesterday i had a triangle craft come over my van it hoverred there for about 2 to four minutes it was shaped like to triangles end to end it was aprox 7 to 10 meteres in length and and about 3 to 5 meters in width at the top it had countours not unlike the stealth bomber the contours were 100 times more refined underneath there was crystyl like center[crystyl ball] it had glass like tubes running from the crystyl ball to each corner of the craft with lighting like bolts pulsing back and forth from the crystyl ball it was intense blue light it had laser like flashing light emerging froiom the side of craft as if it were emrging from the metal itself no bulbs or source of the flashing light to speak off at the time this was happining i was laying in bed blowing smoke rings out my window it was a dead still i was impressed with the smoke rings i was making lol that when i seen the craft come over my van i was frozen with fear and at the same time transfixed on the on the crystyl ball and lightning like currents pulsing through the tubes i recall looking at my digitil clock just before the craft came over it was 12 a,m exactly when it was all over it was 2 am exactly some how i had lost 2 hours of time it seemd like only 2 to 4 minutes i dont recall seing any aliens but how ever beforew the craft came over i did see a grey apear in my mind i found it odd because it was not my thought black eyes as this wasa happing i was closing and opening my eyes saying to my self this is not happining but when i re opend my eyes the craft was still there 3 days later i found out there was other people who had seen the craft it was reported in the local paper 13 people had witnessed the craft in the park ridge area where i lived at the time 1 women apperntly rang air force and the told here it was private euntrapernour in a private blimp 15 years later i still live in fear i cant sleep with out thinking about the event most nights i have drawn apicture and will attach to this
trends: There have been 27 other sightings in Brisbane
There were no other sightings in Brisbane on or around July 31st 1995
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: triangle ufo hovvering above my van
